2: ALTER TABLE appoe_plugin_people ADD idUser INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER country;
3: ALTER TABLE appoe_files CHANGE type type VARCHAR(55) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL;
4: ALTER TABLE appoe_plugin_itemGlue_articles_content DROP INDEX idArticle;
5: ALTER TABLE appoe_plugin_itemGlue_articles_content ADD UNIQUE(idArticle, type, lang);
6: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS appoe_plugin_itemGlue_articles_relations (id INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,PRIMARY KEY (id),type VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL,typeId INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,articleId INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,UNIQUE (type, typeId, articleId),updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=11;
